articles.author: Kelly Fuller
articles.title: Jack de Belin rape trial told 'nothing was consensual that night', as alleged victim cross-examined - ABC News
articles.description: The complainant in the rape trial of NRL player Jack de Belin says the sex was not consensual on the night of the alleged assault and denies suggestions she did not say "no" or "stop".
articles.content:
The complainant in the rape trial of NRL player Jack de Belin has told the court the sex was not consensual and denied suggestions she did not say "no" or "stop".

articles.author: Brad Waters
articles.title: McEvoy learns verdict on hefty Cup whip fine - Racenet
articles.description: The Victorian Racing Tribunal has slashed jockey Kerrin McEvoy’s $50,000 fine for overuse of the whip in last Tuesday’s Melbourne Cup.
articles.content:
The Victorian Racing Tribunal has slashed jockey Kerrin McEvoys $50,000 fine for overuse of the whip in last Tuesdays Melbourne Cup.
McEvoy copped the huge fine after pleading guilty to using the wh… [+1448 chars]

articles.description: After being written off by all and sundry leading into game one, the Maroons now head to Sydney with the chance to wrap up the series following an upset.
articles.content:
